text: Open Season may refer to: * Open season (hunting), a hunting term * An annual enrollment period * Open Season, a book in The Hardy Boys series, #59 * Open Season (movie series), a series of animated movies ** Open Season (movie), released in 2006 ** Open Season 2, sequel released in 2008 ** Open Season 3, a second sequel released in 2010 ** Open Season: Scared Silly, a third sequel released in 2015
title: Open Season
